name: Amazing Fishing
description:
Amazing Fishing is an easy and fun fishing game, you need to explore different seas to catch more fish;
Simple game operation can provide every player an immensely satisfying experience in this game, Try your best to improve yourself to get more rare fish!

Game Features:
- Easy to control, Fun to play;
- More than 50 categories of fish are available for collection;
- 9 maps waiting for you to explore;
- Mysterious treasures are hidden in the vast ocean;
- We also have Boss fish waiting for you to challenge;
- Fever mode waiting for you to experience the coolest Golden Fish Mode;
- You can upgrade your fishing rods and fishing containers help you become the most professional fishing master;

There are also other Easter eggs waiting for you to discover! Can you find penguins in the game?

We'll be glad to see your feedback at machbird.contact@gmail.com
Join us online: https://www.facebook.com/Amazing-Fishing-2148983695366292/
